item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好美股继续上涨。日元继续暴跌，现实严峻。贝莱德进一步进军私人市场。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks just keep rising. A grim reality sets as yen continues its plunge. BlackRock expands further into private markets. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 玻利维亚逮捕领导未遂政变的前陆军将军
item.description: 玻利维亚逮捕了一名前陆军将军，他曾冲进总统府，企图推翻路易斯-阿尔塞的社会主义政府。【原文：Bolivia arrested the former army general who had stormed the presidential palace in an attempt to overturn the socialist government of Luis Arce.】

item.title: 市场综述：日元跌至新低，亚洲股市将下跌
item.description: 在美国科技股尾盘下跌、日元走软之后，亚洲股市将低开，这引发了新的猜测，即官员可能会出手支持日元。【原文：Shares in Asia were set to open lower after US tech stocks fell in late trading while the yen weakened, triggering fresh speculation officials may step in to support the currency.】

item.title: 交易员 "对抗美联储"，540 亿美元的多头债券 ETF 创下历史记录
item.description: 本周，随着一批投资者重新调整对美联储今年何时降息的押注，最大的长期债券 ETF 赚取了创纪录的现金。【原文：The biggest long-duration bond ETF raked in record cash this week as a cohort of investors recalibrate bets on when the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates this year.】

item.title: 道明称大幅降息将重振加拿大经济增长
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）经济学家詹姆斯-奥兰多（James Orlando）表示，加拿大央行先于美联储开始降息的决定最终将为加拿大经济带来 "巨大的顺风"。【原文：The Bank of Canada’s decision to begin cutting interest rates ahead of the Federal Reserve will ultimately lead to a “big tailwind” for the Canadian economy, Toronto-Dominion Bank economist James Orlando said.】

item.title: Naver 支持的网络动漫公司可能以最高价进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在线漫画公司Webtoon Entertainment Inc.正在为潜在投资者提供指导，该公司在美国首次公开发行股票的价格可能会在市场定价范围的顶端。【原文：Online comics company Webtoon Entertainment Inc. is giving prospective investors guidance that it is likely to price shares in its US initial public offering at the top of a marketed range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大银行顺利通过压力测试，预示更多赔付
item.description: 美国最大的银行通过了美联储的年度压力测试，为股东获得更高的派息铺平了道路，因为该行业正等待着另一项更严格资本要求提案的淡化版本。【原文：The biggest US banks passed the Federal Reserve’s annual stress test, paving the way for higher shareholder payouts as the industry awaits a watered-down version of a separate proposal for stricter capital requirements.】

item.title: 米莱伊重建阿根廷外汇储备的努力停滞不前
item.description: 阿根廷中央银行正在努力重建外汇储备，因为它开始在货币市场上花钱，以捍卫支撑比索的控制措施，因为投资者认为比索被高估了。【原文：Argentina’s central bank is struggling to rebuild its chest of foreign reserves as it starts to spend money in currency markets to defend controls propping up the peso, which investors see as overvalued.】

item.title: 高盛为西班牙贝蒂斯足球俱乐部再融资提供中介服务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，西班牙皇家贝蒂斯足球俱乐部（Real Betis Balompie SAD）即将就其 1.2 亿欧元（1.28 亿美元）的债务再融资达成协议，该交易由高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Spanish football club Real Betis Balompie SAD is nearing an agreement to refinance its €120 million ($128 million) debt in a deal arranged by Goldman Sachs Group Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 日元持续下滑显示美联储对全球市场的控制力
item.description: 随着日元接连跌破里程碑水平，日本当局正面临严峻的现实：除非美联储放弃 "加息换长期 "的政策路线，否则日元的跌势不会停止。而他们对此却无能为力。【原文：A grim reality is setting in for Japanese authorities as the yen plunges through milestone levels in rapid succession: The slide won’t stop until the Federal Reserve relents on its higher-for-longer policy path. And they have no control over that.】

item.title: NFL 美洲虎队赢得市政府 14 亿美元体育场翻新项目的帮助
item.description: 杰克逊维尔市议会周二批准了美国国家橄榄球联盟美洲虎队与佛罗里达州城市之间的协议，将耗资 14 亿美元翻新 EverBank 体育场。【原文：The Jacksonville City Council approved an agreement on Tuesday between the National Football League’s Jaguars and the Florida city for a $1.4 billion renovation of EverBank Stadium.】

item.title: 疾控中心文件显示，Moderna RSV 疫苗疗效随时间下降
item.description: 新数据显示，Moderna 公司 RSV 疫苗的疗效在第二年急剧下降，低于竞争对手的疫苗，因此该公司股价下跌。【原文：Moderna Inc. shares sank after new data showed the efficacy of its RSV shot fell sharply in the second year and was lower than that of rival vaccines.】

item.title: 安杜兰放弃著名的石油贸易，转而从事铜和可可贸易
item.description: 皮埃尔-安杜兰（Pierre Andurand）是一位因大胆押注能源市场而一举成名的交易员，如今他已不再涉足原油领域，而是坚持看好铜和可可价格上涨的前景。【原文：Pierre Andurand, the trader who rose to fame because of bold bets in the energy markets, is now stepping away from crude oil while sticking with an outlook for higher copper and cocoa prices.】

item.title: 美国新房库存量创 2008 年以来新高，威胁建筑业发展
item.description: 美国新房的库存量达到了自十多年前房地产泡沫破裂以来的最高水平，这增加了建筑商在市场渴望更低借贷成本的情况下削减产量的风险。【原文：The inventory of new US homes stands at the highest since the bursting of the housing bubble more than a decade ago, raising the risk that builders will dial back production in a market longing for cheaper borrowing costs.】

item.title: 巴克莱称美国可转债繁荣接近科维德时代顶峰
item.description: 最近，可转换债券的发行量激增，可能使美国每年的可转换债券发行量达到近 1,000 亿美元；这是自大流行病时期以来，这个小众市场从未达到过的水平。【原文：A recent surge in convertible bond issuance could bring the annual tally in the US to nearly $100 billion — a level that this niche corner of the market has not seen since the depths of the pandemic era.】

item.title: 巴恩斯集团探索包括出售在内的各种选择
item.description: 据知情人士透露，生产军用涡轮发动机部件和其他产品的巴恩斯集团公司正在探索包括出售在内的战略选择。【原文：Barnes Group Inc., which makes components used in military turbine engines among other products, is exploring strategic options including a sale, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Blackstone 考虑 50 亿美元顾问费的各种选择
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正在探索各种方案，包括出售或首次公开募股 Legence（一家专门从事可持续发展咨询的公司）。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is exploring options including a sale or an initial public offering of Legence, a company that specializes in sustainability consulting, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能狂潮推动亚马逊市值达到 2 万亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）有史以来首次达到 2 万亿美元的市场估值，人工智能推动的涨势将这家科技巨头推向了创纪录的更高水平。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has reached a $2 trillion market valuation for the first time ever as an artificial intelligence-fueled rally pushed the tech giant deeper into record territory.】

item.title: Zenas 生物制药公司考虑最快于 7 月进行 1.5 亿美元以上的首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士称，随着生物技术公司重返市场进行首次股票销售，Zenas 生物制药公司正寻求在美国首次公开募股中筹集 1.5 亿美元或更多资金。【原文：Zenas BioPharma is seeking to raise $150 million or more in a US initial public offering, people familiar with the situation said, as biotechnology companies return to the market for first-time share sales.】

item.title: 页岩油公司高管认为收购将挤压美国石油产量
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行的一项调查显示，如果席卷页岩产业的企业收购热潮持续下去，美国的石油产量将会下降。【原文：US oil production will decline if the corporate-acquisition spree sweeping the shale sector is prolonged, according to a Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas survey.】

item.title: 卢拉巩固了巴西央行向连续 CPI 目标的转变
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周三宣布，巴西将采用新的通胀目标制，央行将设定连续 12 个月的通胀目标。【原文：Brazil will adopt a new inflation targeting regime that will see its central bank set goals for continuous 12-month periods, a change cemented by President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Wednesday.】

item.title: 韩国加密货币投资公司 Hashed 进军阿布扎比
item.description: 阿布扎比有利的监管环境使其成为全球最热门的加密货币中心之一，Hashed Ventures 是最新一家在阿布扎比拓展业务的数字资产公司。【原文：Hashed Ventures is the latest digital-asset company to expand its footprint in Abu Dhabi, where an advantageous regulatory environment has made it one of the hottest global crypto hubs.】

item.title: Neil Dutta 认为美联储可能从 "偷梁换柱 "的数据中发现错误
item.description:
只有两个数据点是重要的

【原文：

Only two data points matter

】

item.title: Rivian 30% 的涨幅仍留下 1,380 亿美元的估值缺口
item.description: 由于投资者对大众汽车公司计划投资电动汽车制造商 Rivian Automotive Inc.从更广阔的视角来看，这一涨势更像是屏幕上的一个小插曲。【原文：Rivian Automotive Inc. shares soared on Wednesday as investors cheered Volkswagen AG’s planned investment in the electric-vehicle maker. Viewed from a wider lens, the rally looks more like a blip on the screen.】

item.title: 随着 PE 投资者对现金的追捧，战神公司的阿鲁格赫蒂看到了更多的交易机会
item.description: 战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp.首席执行官 Mike Arougheti 表示，随着私募股权赞助商寻找现金，该公司为中型市场收购提供贷款的渠道正在不断扩大。【原文：Ares Management Corp. Chief Executive Officer Mike Arougheti said the firm’s pipeline for lending to middle-market buyouts — a key business area — is growing as private equity sponsors look for cash.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克保护天然气供应商免受俄罗斯供应的法律风险
item.description: 由于担心俄罗斯天然气欧洲买家的付款可能会被扣押，斯洛伐克已采取行动保护其主要天然气供应商免受法律索赔，此前一家法院裁定德国公用事业公司 Uniper SE 因未交付俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）供应的天然气而获得损害赔偿。【原文：Slovakia has moved to protect its main gas provider from legal claims on concerns that payments from European buyers of Russian gas could get seized after a court awarded damages to German utility Uniper SE for undelivered Gazprom supplies.】

item.title: 诺和诺德公司因心脏药物失败而承担 8.2 亿美元费用
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）表示，在停止了去年收购的一种实验性心脏病药物的后期研究后，该公司将计提约 57 亿丹麦克朗（约合 8.2 亿美元）的减值损失。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S said it will take an impairment of about 5.7 billion Danish kroner ($820 million) after halting a late-stage study of an experimental heart drug it acquired last year.】

item.title: 日元疲软为避开债券提供又一理由，国债下跌
item.description: 国债收益率下跌，使大多数国债收益率达到一周多来的最高水平，因为日币币值的最新下滑加剧了债券投资者的焦虑情绪。【原文：Treasuries fell, sending most yields to the highest levels in more than a week, as the latest slide in the value of the Japanese currency compounded bond investors’ anxiety.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行与普华永道续签 1.4 亿美元审计合同
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）决定与普华永道会计师事务所（PriceWaterhouseCoopers LLP）续签审计服务合同，有可能将欧洲最大的审计事务所之一的关系维持到 2035 年。【原文：Banco Santander SA decided to renew its contract for audit services with PriceWaterhouseCoopers LLP, potentially keeping one of Europe’s biggest such relationships with the firm until 2035.】

item.title: SNB 新任女利率制定者不太可能挑战现状
item.description: 她可能只是瑞士国家银行利率制定委员会中的第二位女性成员，但在其他大多数方面，佩特拉-楚丁都与她的同事们如出一辙。【原文：She may only be the second woman to ever sit on the Swiss National Bank’s rate-setting board, but in most other respects, Petra Tschudin is cut from the same cloth as her colleagues.】
